docs.snippet: The Alberta fire department said it would be a couple more days before investigators would be able to determine whether the fire there was caused by people or lightning.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Chief Sides With Apple Against F.B.I. Over Terrorist’s iPhone
headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Backs Apple in Its Refusal to Unlock iPhone

docs.abstract: Facebook chief Mark Zuckerberg declares his support for Apple in its battle with federal government over efforts to gain access to San Bernardino gunman's iPhone.

headline.print_headline: Oregon Refuge Occupiers Search for Allies
headline.main: Opposing Factions Take to Facebook in Oregon Wildlife Refuge Dispute

docs.abstract: Antigovernment protesters occupying Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Oregon try to enlist support of Burns Paiute Tribe and of local ranchers, in face of escalating demands from area residents and state officials that they vacate property.

docs.snippet: The social network’s well-documented difficulty with users’ bad behavior may well be its biggest concern. But at least its executives admit it is a problem.
